name: FSK Super Brick Breaker
description:
This is a remake of the old Atari 2600 Super Breakout Progressive Mode.

This is my first game written with Unity!

I'm still tweaking the game balance.

I'm also including an Android build (sideload required).  I'm going to set up my Google Play account later.

If the game is popular, I'll make an expansion.  Otherwise, I'll probably move on to my next project.
